verbose_text: Sodium chloride, previously shown to increase Th17 cell differentiation via serum glucocorticoid kinase (SGK) 1, an immediate early response gene induced following cellular stress, resulted in decreased levels of Th1 and Th2 cell polarization but increased levels of Th17 cell differentiation (XREF_FIG A).
